UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that may represent a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial properties of two novel peptides derived from Theobroma cacao osmotin.
Literature.Author: Falcao LL, Silva-Werneck JO, de R Ramos A, Martins NF, Bresso E, Rodrigues MA, Bemquerer MP, Marcellino LH

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Saccharomyces cerevisiae S288C(MIC=40µM),Pichia pastoris X-33(MIC=20µM),Fusarium solani f. sp. glycines(90-100% Inhibition=40µM),Colletotrichum gossypii(70-80% Inhibition=40µM),Moniliophthora perniciosa(40-50% Inhibition=100µM)
